notes: This registry is machine-readable guidance for tool selection.
If a tool is missing in your build, update ai_introspect or apply the relevant patch.

tools.name: bootstrap_from_zips
tools.summary: Extract ai_introspect+repo zips, install toolbelt, rebuild index.

tools.name: build_regex_index
tools.signature: build_regex_index(path, pattern, *, lines=3, direction='both', flags=re.MULTILINE, encoding='utf-8', cache_root=None, pattern_name=None)

tools.name: callees
tools.summary: Find call sites within a given source symbol.

tools.name: callers
tools.summary: Find call sites calling a target.

tools.name: doctor
tools.summary: Detailed DB health snapshot + refs distribution.

tools.name: impact
tools.summary: Blast radius summary by file for a target.

tools.name: nav
tools.signature: nav(query, *, repo_root, limit=20, db_path=None, explain=False, highlight=False)
tools.summary: Search symbols/paths/snippets/refs with optional FTS and explainability.

tools.name: nav_status
tools.summary: Quick DB schema + table counts + FTS enabled.

tools.name: preflight_and_package
tools.signature: preflight_and_package(repo_root, *, targets=None, use_modified_since_index=True, zip_name='update.zip', update_sqlite_index=True, db_path=None)
tools.summary: Preflight + optional SQLite refresh + patch packaging.

tools.name: print_python_symbols
tools.signature: print_python_symbols(path, *, show_imports=True, show_functions=True, show_decorators=True, show_calls=False, min_call_count=1, encoding='utf-8', max_width=120)

tools.name: print_regex_context
tools.signature: print_regex_context(path, pattern, *, lines=3, direction='both', flags=re.MULTILINE, encoding='utf-8', max_width=120)

tools.name: regex_context
tools.signature: regex_context(path, pattern, *, lines=3, direction='both', flags=re.MULTILINE, encoding='utf-8')

tools.name: search_artifacts
tools.signature: search_artifacts(*, artifact_type=None, source_contains=None, tag_equals=None, latest_only=False, cache_root=None)

tools.name: show_match
tools.summary: Show bounded context for a match (snippet preferred).
